name: digital-footprint-finder
description: Digital Footprint Finder - Search for usernames across the web

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && node --watch index" "python python/sherlock.py"
scripts.build: npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix api
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd api && node index.js" "python python/sherlock.py"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix api
